txt.en: Even in the face of insurmountable odds, you fight with a ferocity never before seen by your foes.

#1:[placeholder]: While utilizing the Red Dawn Discipline the following skills will be 15% more likely to critically hit: #1:{None|Ride By, Keen Strike[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders[C]|Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Destabilizing Strike[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Clash of Arms, Rohan's Edge[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Enduring Embers, Bond of the Rider[L]|Hammer of Rohan, Dirge, Cry of the Eorlingas, Call of the Eorlingas, Coda of the Eorlingas[I]|Fixation of Flame, Oration of Embers, Resolution of Fire[K]|Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Skill of the Eorlingas[W]| Slash, Bee Swarm, Execute[B]| Strike, Throw, Reckless Attack, Mocking Taunt, Momentous Hit[R]|Quick Strike, Precise Blade, Anchored Thrust[O]}
